title.narrative: The Third Conference on National Dialogues 2017

description.narrative: The Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland is organizing the third conference on National Dialogues and non-formal dialogue processes together with a consortium of NGOs in April 2017 in Helsinki Finland. This is a continuation of conferences held in April 2014 and November 2015 which enjoyed wide participation and deepened the understanding of dialogue processes among attendees enabling both stakeholders from multiple countries and practitioners in the field and internationally take the collaborative lesso ns forward. The conference will again provide a space for joint reflection and in-depth discussion between practitioners stakeholders and experts working with dialogue processes in different contexts.Building on the ground covered in these past conferences the third National Dialogue Conference to be held 5-6 April 2017 (tbc) focuses on the wider ecosystem of national dialogues: what happens around national dialogues regionally and locally and how does this affect them.The overall objective of the conferenc e is to contribute to improved knowledge and enhanced practice of national dialogues by policy-makers practitioners and researchers alike..The specific objectives of the conference are to:-Enhance sharing and learning on experiences for national dialogue s takeholders facilitators support actors and international experts around thematic/geographic issues-Deepen common understanding of the link between regional-national and national-local dynamics and their impact on national dialogues-Offer an innovative and enabling environment for normative and methodological reflections including concrete relevant and transferable design challenges and solutionsThe conference is anchored around two related leading thematic elements which together explore the environment ar ound national dialogues: on one hand the link between regional dynamics and national dialogues and on the other hand the link between state nation and national dialogue
